A creature moves out of the way and takes no damage if it succeeds on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. A vehicle moves out of the way and takes no damage if its driver succeeds on the saving throw.

traits.name: Creature Capacity
traits.desc: 4 medium creatures

actions.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
actions.desc: Drive and steer the Tormentor.

actions.name: Harpoon Flinger (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
actions.desc: Ammunition: 10 harpoons. Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Juke
reactions.desc: If the Tormentor is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the Tormentor advantage on a Dexterity saving throw.

traits.name: Goring Rush
traits.desc: Immediately after using the Dash action, Torogar can make one melee attack with his horns.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: Torogar can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

traits.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc:
As a bonus action, Torogar can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if Torogar is knocked unconscious or if his turn ends and he hasn’t attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since his last turn. While raging, Torogar gains the following benefits:

•He has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

•He deals an extra 3 damage when he hits a target with a melee weapon attack.

•He has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Torogar wears gauntlets of flaming fury and a belt of fire giant strength. Without the belt, his Strength is 21. He also carries a soul coin.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Torogar makes three attacks: two with his scimitars and one with his horns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage, or 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage while raging, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage from the gauntlets of flaming fury.

actions.name: Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage, or 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage while raging.

monsters.name: Gideon Lightward
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Regenration
traits.desc: Gideon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of his next turn. Gideon is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Gideon attacks twice with his fists.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Withering Gaze
actions.desc: Gideon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Arkhan the Cruel
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft. (can see invisible creatures out to the same range), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Aura of Hate
traits.desc: While Arkhan isn’t incapacitated, he and all fiends and undead within 30 feet of him deal 4 extra damage whenever they hit with a melee weapon attack (already factored into Arkhan’s attacks). This extra damage is of the same type as the weapon’s damage type.

traits.name: Hand of Vecna
traits.desc: The Hand of Vecna has 8 charges and regains 1d4 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. Arkhan can cast the following spells from the hand by expending the specified number of charges (spell save DC 18): finger of death (5 charges), sleep (1 charge), slow (2 charges), and teleport (3 charges).

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Arkhan’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). He can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3/day each: animate dead, branding smite (at 4th level), revivify

1/day each: geas, raise dead

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Arkhan wields Fane-Eater and wears a suit of obsidian flint dragon plate. The armor gives Arkhan advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the grappled condition on him.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Arkhan makes three weapon attacks.

actions.name: Fane-Eater (Battleaxe)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (1d8 + 12) slashing damage, or 17 (1d10 + 12) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target is a creature and Arkhan rolls a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and Arkhan regains an amount of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 4 piercing damage and 9 (2d8) cold damage if the javelin was used to make a melee attack.

monsters.name: Crokek'Toeck
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Crokek’toeck can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Crokek’toeck has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Crokek’toeck’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Secure Memory
traits.desc: Crokek’toeck is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: Crokek’toeck’s long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 44 (10d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Disgorge Allies (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Crokek’toeck opens its mouth and disgorges 1d4 barlguras, 3d6 gnolls led by 1 gnoll fang of Yeenoghu, 6d6 dretches, or 1d3 vrocks (see the Monster Manual for these creatures’ stat blocks). Each creature it disgorges appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Crokek’toeck’s mouth, or the next closest unoccupied space.

monsters.name: Merregon
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
monsters.languages: understand Infernal but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the merregon’s darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend of challenge rating 6 or higher is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks.

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Loyal Bodyguard
reactions.desc: When another fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.

monsters.name: Yeenoghu
monsters.damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Yeenoghu’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic

3/day each: dispel magic, fear, invisibility

1/day: teleport

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Yeenoghu’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc:
Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause one of the following additional effects, either of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multiattack):

1. The attack deals an extra 13 (2d12) bludgeoning damage.

2. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of Yeenoghu’s next turn.

3. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the confusion spell until the start of Yeenoghu’s next turn.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (1d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Yeenoghu regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary_actions.name: Charge
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.

legendary_actions.name: Swat Away
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.

legendary_actions.name: Savage (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes a bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

monsters.name: Nupperibo
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., blind beyond this radius, passive Perception 11

traits.name: Cloud of Vermin
traits.desc: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hunger-Driven
traits.desc: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo’s Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Princeps Kovik
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.
Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is incapacitated or dies.

reactions.name: Unnerving Mask
reactions.desc: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its turn.

monsters.name: Baphomet
monsters.damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If Baphomet moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Baphomet’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic

3/day each: dispel magic, dominate beast, hunter’s mark, maze, wall of stone

1/day: teleport

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Baphomet’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of his turn, Baphomet can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Baphomet makes three attacks: one with Heartcleaver, one with his bite, and one with his gore attack.

actions.name: Heartcleaver
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc:
Each creature of Baphomet’s choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.

If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Baphomet regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary_actions.name: Heartcleaver Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet makes a melee attack with Heartcleaver.

legendary_actions.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet moves up to his speed, then makes a gore attack.

monsters.name: Haruman
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered

traits.name: Diabolical Sense
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.

traits.name: Infernal Tack
traits.desc: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its nightmare companion.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The narzugon uses its Infernal Command or Terrifying Command. It also makes three hellfire lance attacks.

actions.name: Hellfire Lance
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature, the creature’s soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in 1d4 hours. If the creature isn’t revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature’s original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can’t be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon’s next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Command
actions.desc: Each creature that isn’t a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon’s Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

actions.name: Healing (1/Day)
actions.desc: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

monsters.name: White Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the abishai’s darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

reactions.name: Vicious Reprisal
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

monsters.name: Duke Thalamra Vanthampur
monsters.senses: passive Perception 13; see also "Devil's Sight" below

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke (1st-Level Spell; 2/Day)
reactions.desc: When Thalamra is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of her that she can see, the creature that damaged her is engulfed in hellish flames and must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ulder makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.

actions.name: +1 Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.

reactions.name: Guardian Strike
reactions.desc: If an enemy within 5 feet of Ulder attacks a target other than him, Ulder can make a melee attack against that enemy.

monsters.name: Sibriex
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Contamination
traits.desc: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Plants that aren’t creatures wither in the aura, and the ground in it is difficult terrain for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex’s Contamination for 24 hours.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The sibriex’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: charm person, command, dispel magic, hold monster

3/day: feeblemind

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
traits.desc: If the sibriex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sibriex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile once and makes three attacks using its chain, bite, or both.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Squirt Bile
actions.desc: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 35 (10d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Warp Creature
actions.desc: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a creature becomes immune to this sibriex’s Warp Creature. On a failed save, the target is poisoned, which causes it to also gain 1 level of exhaustion. While poisoned in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of exhaustion caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to suffer another level of exhaustion. Once the target reaches 6 levels of exhaustion, it dies and instantly transforms into a living abyssal wretch under the sibriex’s control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The sibriex regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex casts a spell.

legendary_actions.name: Spray Bile
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile.

legendary_actions.name: Warp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Warp Creature.

monsters.name: Bulezau
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Rotting Presence
traits.desc: When any creature that isn’t a demon starts its turn within 30 feet one or more bulezaus, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage plus 1 necrotic damage for each bulezau within 30 feet of it.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bulezau’s long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.desc: The bulezau has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Barbed Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease ends. While poisoned in this way, the target sports festering boils, coughs up flies, and sheds rotting skin, and the target must repeat the saving throw after every 24 hours that elapse. On a successful save, the disease ends. On a failed save, the target’s hit point maximum is reduced by 4 (1d8). The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

monsters.name: Abyssal Chicken
monsters.speed: 30 ft., fly 30 ft (see Bad Flier below)
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

traits.name: Bad Flier
traits.desc: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it’s airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Kostchtchie
monsters.damage_immunities: cold; poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, lightning

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Kostchtchie fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Kostchtchie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Kostchtchie’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: command, darkness

1/day each: dispel evil and good, gate, harm, telekinesis, teleport, wind walk

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Kostchtchie makes two melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (1d6 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, or 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 (3d6) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc: Kostchtchie can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Kostchtchie regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Kostchtchie makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Charge
legendary_actions.desc: Kostchtchie moves up to his speed.

legendary_actions.name: Curse (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Kostchtchie curses one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The cursed creature gains vulnerability to all damage dealt by Kostchtchie until the end of Kostchtchie’s next turn.

actions.name: Skull Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws of the Grave
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Demon Grinder
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned, unconcious

traits.name: Crushing Wheels
traits.desc: The Demon Grinder can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. When it does, the creature must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. If the creature was already prone, it takes an extra 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage. This trait can’t be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

traits.name: Prone Deficiency
traits.desc: If the Demon Grinder rolls over and falls prone, it can’t right itself and is incapacitated until flipped upright.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The Demon Grinder’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Cargo Capacity
traits.desc: 1 ton

traits.name: Creature Capacity
traits.desc: 8 Medium creatures

actions.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
actions.desc: Drive and steer the Demon Grinder.

actions.name: Chomper (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) piercing damage. A target reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ground to bits and spit out through pipes on both sides of the Demon Grinder. Any nonmagical items the target was holding or carrying are destroyed as well.

actions.name: Wrecking Ball (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (8d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Double the damage if the target is an object or a structure.

actions.name: 2 Harpoon Flingers (Each Station Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
actions.desc: Ammunition: 10 harpoons per station. Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

traits.name: Detect Invisibility
traits.desc: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym’s sight.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Sense
traits.desc: A tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

monsters.name: Abyssal Wretch
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Winged Boots
traits.desc: Mordenkainen can fly at the same walking speed up to 4 hours per day.

traits.name: Robe of the Archmagi
traits.desc:
Mordenkainen has the below effects due to this robe, already included in the stats:

• If he's not wearing armor, his base Armor Class is 15 + his Dexterity modifier.

• He has advantage on Saving Throws against spell and other magical effects.

• His spell save DC and spell Attack bonus each increase by 2.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: He has advantage on Saving Throws against spell and other magical effects.

traits.name: Arcane Recover (1/Day)
traits.desc: When he finishes a short rest, Mordenkainen recovers all his spell slots from 4th level and lower.

traits.name: School of Divination - Portent
traits.desc: At the end of each long rest, Mordenkainen rolls 3 d20s which he can use to reroll any attack, saving throw, or ability check made by him or an enemy. This can be used only once a turn. They are lost at the end of a long rest. New dices need to be rolled.

traits.name: School of Divination - The Third Eye
Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Mordenkainen is a 20th-level spellcaster. his spellcasting ability is Intelligence, (spell save DC 22, +14 to hit with spell attacks.) He can cast magic missile and melf's acid arrow at will. He can cast fireball and blink without expending a slot slot, but he can't do so again until he finishes a short or long rest. Mordenkainen has the following spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): mage hand, light, prestidigitation, fire bolt, chill touch

1st level (4 slots): charm person, detect magic, disguise self, shield, absorb elements

2nd level (3 slots): mirror image, detect thoughts, misty steps, suggestion

3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance, slow, lightning bolt, counterspell, dispel magic

4th level (3 slots): polymorph, blight, greater invisibility, mordenkainen private sanctum

5th level (3 slots): scrying, teleportation circle

6th level (2 slots): desintegrate

7th level (2 slots): mordenkainen's sword

8th level (1 slot): sunburst

9th level (1 slot): foresight, wish

actions.name: Fire Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +14 to hit, range 120ft., one target. Hit 22 (4d10)

reactions.name: Rod of Absorption
reactions.desc: Mordenkainen can use his reaction to absorb a spell that is targeting only you and not with an area of effect. The absorbed spell's effect is canceled, and the spell's energy — not the spell itself — is stored in the rod. The energy has the same level as the spell when it was cast. The rod can absorb and store up to 50 levels of energy over the course of its existence. Once the rod absorbs 50 levels of energy, it can't absorb more. If you are targeted by a spell that the rod can't store, the rod has no effect on that spell. If you are a spellcaster holding the rod, you can convert energy stored in it into Spell Slots to cast Spells you have prepared or know. You can create Spell Slots only of a level equal to or lower than your own Spell Slots, up to a maximum of 5th level.

monsters.name: Feonor
monsters.damage_resistances: damage from spells; non magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing (from stoneskin)

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The archmage is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared: 

• Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile
• 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell,fly, lightning bolt
• 4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin*
• 5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force
• 6th level (1 slot): globe of invulnerability
• 7th level (1 slot): teleport
• 8th level (1 slot): mind blank*
• 9th level (1 slot): time stop
* The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.desc: As long as the death’s head is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The death’s head has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The death’s head uses Stunning Gaze and makes two dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stunning Gaze
actions.desc: The death’s head targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Unstoppable (3/Day)
reactions.desc: The death’s head reduces the damage it takes from an attack to 0.

monsters.name: Hollyphant
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Aura of Invulnerability
traits.desc: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can’t affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The hollyphant’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: light

2/day each: bless, cure wounds, protection from evil and good

1/day each: banishment, heal, raise dead, shapechange (into a golden-furred mammoth with feathered wings and a flying speed of 120 ft.), teleport (with no chance of error)

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hollyphant’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Trumpet (3/Day)
actions.desc: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:

actions.name: Trumpet of Blasting
actions.desc: Each creature in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn’t deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren’t being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Trumpet of Sparkles
actions.desc: Creatures in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

traits.name: Shadow of Guilt
traits.desc: Thavius’s shadow is that of a pudgy, horned devil with small wings.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The iron consul has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The iron consul makes one attack with its spear and can use its Voice of Command ability.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Voice of Command
actions.desc: The iron consul selects up to two allies within 90 feet of it that can hear its commands. Each ally can immediately use its reaction to make one melee attack.

monsters.name: Tiamat
monsters.damage_immunities: acid; cold; fire; lightning; poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned
monsters.senses: darkvision 240 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 36

traits.name: Discorporation
traits.desc: When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting (3/Day)
traits.desc: Tiamat can innately cast divine word (spell save DC 26). Her spellcasting ability is Charisma.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.desc: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
traits.desc: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Tiamat's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.desc: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc:
Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

Tiamat’s legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can’t choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc:
Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options listed. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.
Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.
Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

legendary_actions.name: Black Dragon Head: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tiamat breathes acid in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Blue Dragon Head: Lightning Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tiamat breathes lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 (16d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Green Dragon Head: Poison Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tiamat breathes poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Constitution saving throw, taking 77 (22d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Red Dragon Head: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tiamat breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tiamat breathes an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 (16d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Lurrash
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Martial Advantage
traits.desc: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Warrior
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Eidolon
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object other than a sacred statue.

traits.name: Sacred Animation (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc: When the eidolon moves into a space occupied by a sacred statue, the eidolon can disappear, causing the statue to become a creature under the eidolon’s control. The eidolon uses the sacred statue’s statistics in place of its own.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Divine Dread
actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the eidolon that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the creature must take the Dash action and move away from the eidolon by the safest available route at the start of each of its turns, unless there is nowhere for it to move, in which case the creature also becomes stunned until it can move again. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any eidolon’s Divine Dread for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Half-Blue Dragon Gladiator
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The half-blue dragon exhales lightning in a 30-­foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Boneclaw
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Common, plus language of it's master

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in 1d10 hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw’s master.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the boneclaw can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Limited Immortality
traits.desc:
A boneclaw can’t be destroyed while its master lives. No matter what happens to a boneclaw’s body, it re-forms within hours and returns to whatever duty its master assigned.
The boneclaw can serve only evil. If its master finds redemption or sincerely turns away from the path of evil, the boneclaw is permanently destroyed.

traits.name: Cackling Slayers
traits.desc: Boneclaws delight in murder, and nothing pleases them more than causing horrific pain. They lurk like spiders in shadowy recesses, waiting for victims to approach within reach of their long, bony limbs. Once speared, a creature is pulled into the darkness to be sliced apart or teleported elsewhere to be tortured to death.

traits.name: Dark REflections
traits.desc: A boneclaw’s master might not want such a servant or even know it has one. Boneclaws bind to petty criminals, bullies, and even particularly cruel children. Even if the master is unaware of its new, horrid bodyguard, its local area will be plagued by disappearances and grisly murders, tied together by the common thread of the master’s envy or hunger for revenge.

traits.name: Undead Nature
traits.desc: A boneclaw doesn’t require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The boneclaw makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Piercing Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

actions.name: Shadow Jump
actions.desc:
If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw’s choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 34 (5d12 + 2) necrotic damage.
The boneclaw then magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it’s grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

reactions.name: Deadly Reach
reactions.desc: In response to a visible enemy moving into its reach, the boneclaw makes one claw attack against that enemy. If the attack hits, the boneclaw can make a second claw attack against the target.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The blackguard is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 33, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:
	 
1st level (4 slots): command, protection from evil and good, thunderous smite
	 
2nd level (3 slots): branding smite, find steed
	 
3rd level (2 slots): blinding smite, dispel magic

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blackguard makes three attacks with its glaive or its shortbow.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the tar get can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Commander
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.desc: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sword wraith makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Call to Honor (1/Day)
actions.desc: To use this action, the sword wraith must have taken damage during the current combat. If the sword wraith can use this action, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and 1d4 + 1 sword wraith warriors appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander’s turn on the same initiative count.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

monsters.name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.desc: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Sacred Statue
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

traits.name: Ghostly Inhabitant
traits.desc: The eidolon that enters the sacred statue remains inside it until the statue drops to 0 hit points, the eidolon uses a bonus action to move out of the statue, or the eidolon is turned or forced out by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the eidolon leaves the statue, it appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the statue.

traits.name: Inert
traits.desc: When not inhabited by an eidolon, the statue is an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 43 (6d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 60 ft./240 ft., one target. Hit: 37 (6d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The priest is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
	 
Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying
	 
1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith
	 
2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon
	 
3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader’s mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water wall
	 
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin 
	 
5th level (1 slot): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 +3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: The priest grants a +10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The priest can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

monsters.name: Greater Zombie
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The zombie has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zombie makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Empowered Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Skeletal Swarm
monsters.damage_resistances: slashing, piercing
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, poisoned, charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Deafening Clatter
traits.desc: Creatures are deafened while in the swarm’s space.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small humanoid. The swarm can’t regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Slash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm’s space. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Mangler
monsters.damage_resistances: cold

traits.name: Ambush
traits.desc: On the first round of each combat, the mangler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that hasn’t taken a turn yet.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the mangler can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mangler makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Claws (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The mangler makes six claw attacks against one target. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed as a bonus action without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The anchorite’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1/day each: augury, bless, lightning bolt (8d6 damage), revivify

3/day: thunderwave (2d8 damage)

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The anchorite can use its action to polymorph into a boar or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Clawed Gauntlet (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tusk (Boar Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Eye of the Law
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The archon’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: calm emotions, command, compelled duel

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc:
If the archon isn’t mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.
While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can’t be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

actions.name: Hammer of Justice
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Pacifying Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the archon’s choice that the archon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its concentration on any spells or other effects, and becomes charmed by the archon for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon’s Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc: The archon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The archon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Rejoin Mount
legendary_actions.desc: If the archon isn’t mounted, it magically teleports to its steed and mounts it as long as the archon and its steed are on the same plane of existence.

legendary_actions.name: Smite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon makes a Hammer of Justice attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Detention (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or be magically teleported to a harmless demiplane until the end of the archon’s next turn, whereupon the target reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

monsters.name: Arclight Phoenix
monsters.damage_resistances: thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, unconcious

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

traits.name: Grounded Lightning
traits.desc: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 (2d10) force damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Lightning Form
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature’s space on a turn, that creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

traits.name: Crackling Death
traits.desc:
When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell.

The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg’s space.

actions.name: Arclight Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (6d8) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix’s choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Nightveil Specter
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc: If the specter isn’t mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the specter can’t be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The specter makes two scythe attacks.

actions.name: Scythe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Mind Twist (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (5d8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Reap Memory (3/Day)
actions.desc: The specter touches one incapacitated creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Loading Rig
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The rig is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rig must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster’s spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: Unstable
traits.desc: If the rig takes damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated with a speed of 0 until a creature activates it with a successful DC 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check made as an action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The armor makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Spiked Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Bolstering Presence
traits.desc: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp

1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield

2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person

3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy

4th level (3 slots): confusion, conjure minor elementals, polymorph

5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster

6th level (1 slot): move earth, wall of ice

7th level (1 slot): prismatic spray

8th level (1 slot): control weather

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The firefist is a 9th-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, sacred flame, spare the dying

1st level (4 slots): guiding bolt, healing word, heroism, shield of faith

2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, scorching ray

3rd level (3 slots): blinding smite, crusader’s mantle, revivify

4th level (3 slots): banishment, wall of fire

5th level (1 slot): flame strike

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firefist makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Guided Attack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When the firefist or one creature it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, the firefist grants a +10 bonus to that roll.

monsters.name: Isperia
monsters.damage_immunities: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Isperia’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 23). Isperia can innately cast imprisonment twice per day, requiring no material components.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.desc: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Isperia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Isperia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Isperia is a 15th-level Azorius spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 23, +14 to hit with spell attacks). Isperia has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

1st level (4 slots): command, detect evil and good, ensnaring strike, sanctuary, shield of faith

2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock, augury, calm emotions, hold person, silence, zone of truth

3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, clairvoyance, counterspell, dispel magic, tongues

4th level (3 slots): divination, locate creature

5th level (2 slots): dispel evil and good, scrying

6th level (1 slot): word of recall

7th level (1 slot): divine word

8th level (1 slot): antimagic field

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Isperia makes two claw attacks. She can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one claw attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

actions.name: Supreme Legal Authority
actions.desc: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can’t take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target’s turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful DC 23 Intelligence saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia’s Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Isperia regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary_actions.name: Supreme Legal Authority (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia uses Supreme Legal Authority.

monsters.name: Hybrid Flier
monsters.damage_resistances: acid

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage.

monsters.name: Battleforce Angel
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, radiant
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The angel doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The angel makes two melee attacks. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage. If the target is within 5 feet of any of the angel’s allies, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Battlefield Inspiration
actions.desc: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the angel’s next turn, each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls and saving throws.

monsters.name: Zegana
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, poison

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Zegana can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Zegana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Zegana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Zegana is a 15th-level Simic spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): acid splash, druidcraft, ray of frost, shape water

1st level (4 slots): color spray, expeditious retreat, fog cloud, shield

2nd level (3 slots): enlarge/reduce, gust of wind

3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, slow

4th level (3 slots): control water, ice storm, polymorph

5th level (2 slots): conjure elemental, creation

6th level (1 slot): move earth, wall of ice
